book.synopsis: In the Old South of the 1930s, when a gentle giant of a man is sentenced to death for the murder and rape of two little girls, the fact that he is black and the girls are white is inflammatory enough, but the situation is further complicated by his near muteness and gift for healing. (Horror)
book.title_long: La milla verde (The Green Mile) (Spanish Edition)
book.dimensions: Height: 7 Inches, Length: 4.25 Inches, Weight: 0.5 Pounds, Width: 1 Inches
